Trade/Device Name(s): Assure Prism multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Assure Prism multi Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Assure Prism multi blood glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Assure Prism multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System using an electrochemical biosensor for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips and alternative sites; intended for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control, not for neonatal use or for diagnosis/screening of diabetes.
